verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing we the King who is coming to reign
Glory to Jesus the Lamb that was slain
Life and salvation His coming shall bring
Joy to all those who know Jesus as King

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Come let us sing Praise to our King
Jesus our King Jesus our King
This is our song who to Jesus belong
Glory to Jesus to Jesus our King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All men who dwell in His marvellous light
Races long severed His love shall unite
Justice and truth from His sceptre shall spring
Wrong shall be ended when Jesus is King

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
All shall be well in His kingdom of peace
Freedom and wisdom and love shall not cease
Foe shall be friend when His triumph we sing
Sword shall be sickle when Jesus is King

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Souls shall be saved from the burden of sin
Doubt shall not darken His witness within
Hell has no terrors and death has no sting
Love is victorious when Jesus is King

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Knowledge and fear of the Lord then shall be
As the deep waters that cover the sea
All things shall be in the splendor of spring
And all harmonious when Jesus is King

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Kingdom of Christ for Your coming we pray
Hasten O Father the dawn of the day
When this new song Your creation shall sing
Satan is conquered and Jesus is King
